parameters.toolDescription:
Get UAE Business Setup Pricing Data

Purpose: Search and retrieve current pricing for UAE business setup packages.

What you can search:
- Package names (IFZA, DMCC, RAKEZ)
- Number of visas (0, 1, 2 visas)
- Free zone names
- Price ranges

When to use:
- Customer asks about pricing
- Customer wants package recommendations
- Customer asks "how much" or "what's the cost"

Returns: package_key, zone, visa_count, price_aed, description, setup_days, includes
